description:
This time... Umaru unusually goes out to get the kotatsu out, lazes around the house in the spirit of Christmas, looks back over the year at New Year`s, lazes around the house at New Year`s, goes to the first shrine visit of the year with Onii-chan, and we get to see in the life of Manager Kanau.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Umaru and Christmas and New Year`s
Umaru et les fêtes de fin d`année
うまるとクリスマスと正月
